import React from 'react'; // Agar yeh path kaam nahi karta, toh kripya verify karein ki App.css file // 'src/styles/' folder mein hai aur path './styles/App.css' nahi hai. const About = () => { return (

Welcome to Food Point

Crafting Culinary Excellence, One Plate at a Time.

{/* 1. Our Story Section */}

üçΩÔ∏è Our Journey

Food Point began in 2025 with a simple philosophy: to fuse the comfort of traditional home-style cooking with the excitement of modern, global flavors. Our founder, **[Food Point]**, started with a small food truck, driven by the passion to share his grandmother's cherished recipes. This humble beginning quickly grew into the thriving restaurant we are today, dedicated to quality and community.

We believe that food connects people. Our space is designed to feel like an extension of your own home‚Äîa place where great memories are made and shared over unforgettable meals.

{/* 2. Our Core Values Section */}

üéØ Our Commitment

Freshness Guaranteed

We source 100% of our produce locally, supporting small farms and ensuring the highest quality, seasonal ingredients are used in every dish.

Exceptional Hospitality

Our team is dedicated to providing warm, attentive service, ensuring your dining experience is smooth, pleasant, and memorable from start to finish.

Innovation in Flavor

While we honor tradition, our chefs constantly experiment, bringing you new, exciting, and creatively balanced dishes that surprise and delight.

{/* 3. Meet the Team Section */}

üßë‚Äçüç≥ Meet Our Leadership

Kashaf Saeed

Head Chef & Culinary Director

Umaira Akram

Operations & Guest Experience

{/* 4. Call to Action/Contact */}

Ready for Your Next Meal?

We invite you to stop by, say hello, and taste the passion in our food. We're open daily!

üìç Visit Us At: 123 Food Lane, City Center

); }; export default About;
